title: The Witches of Corndale
description: Lucy Coleville's quiet and peaceful life in her old cottage has to come to an end when a young girl, Evy Jones, shows up at her doorstep and greets her in a language which she hasn't heard for centuries. Evy Jones, looking for some answers and unaware of her growing powers, will need Lucy's help to go through a mysterious past, forgotten worlds, deadly beasts and a stubborn chase. It is a journey which will change Evy's life in many ways some of which she would have never thought of.
author: Murat Tash
